name: Dataverse
introduce: Dataverse is a web3 folder system, committed to returning the data sovereignty and data utility to users.Dataverse enables users to create their ownable personal spaces to aggregate Web2 & Web3 contents and control their social graphs in one place. In the metaverse personal space created via Dataverse, users possess the ownership of any data including web3 assets, content, preferences, user profiles, and more, and users have full customizable access to their own data.
